name: ForzaTAPE® T-T246
full_name: ForzaTAPE® T-T246 – High Bond Acrylic Double-Sided Tape
description: ForzaTAPEÂ® T-T246 is a high bond acrylic double-sided tape that can withstand a wide range of weathering and temperature conditions without losing adhesion.
benefits: Can withstand a wide range of weathering and temperature conditions without losing adhesion
Reduces weight and replaces screw, riveting and welding
High strength bond resists moisture, chemicals, dust, and UV
Very flexible, with elongation rate of 800%
Instant high strength; bonds well to many surfaces
Long aging, resists hardening or embrittlement
Excellent sealing, shockproof and soundproof characteristics
Adheres well to high and low surface energy substrates
applications: Bonds a wide variety of materials where permanent flexibility is needed, including plastics, metals, wood, and paper
Bonds parts where static load is high in the transportation, electronics, advertising, hardware, and construction industries
Also bonds parts in the solar PV and elevator industries
Ensure substrate is clean and dry, and free from dust, dirt, oil, wax, or silicone
For best results, use of our primer to clean surface and promote adhesion is recommended
Apply to the part to be bonded, ensuring that no air is trapped between the tape and the substrate
Apply with recommended application pressure of 15 pounds per inch of tape width
At the point of final assembly or lamination, remove the release liner and apply with care to avoid wrinkles or trapped air
Recommend application temperature to achieve best results is 65° F or above
